rules_text: After a player chooses two or more modes while casting a spell, you may pick one of those modes. That mode is no longer chosen. [i](That player doesn’t pick targets or pay costs related to that mode. If a mode is chosen multiple times, only one instance of that mode is lost.)[/i]
